original_text: They that hate thee shall be clothed with shame; and the dwelling place of the wicked shall come to nought.
korean_text: 너를 미워하는 자는 부끄러움을 당할 것이라 악인의 장막은 없어지리라

sentences.original_text: They that hate thee shall be clothed with shame
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 미워하는 자들이 수치를 입을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and the dwelling place of the wicked
